column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Sompatsorn - I apologize for your disappointing visit to our restaurant. JINYA Ramen Bar is a California-based franchise concept
column2: so I'm wondering if you have tried our ramen in Los Angeles. Here in Houston
column3: we Â use the same recipes
column4: ingredients and cooking protocols at all of our locations
column5: and we get assessed on a regular basis by our corporate headquarters. I'm not sure why you found our broth lacking in richness and flavor. May I ask which ramen you ordered? We pride ourselves in customer satisfaction
column6: so if you're ever dissatisfied with any of our food items
column7: simply mention this to your server and he or she will be more than happy to replace your ramen or offer you something else to try.
